answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a detailed clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms, though this could indicate potential issues related to the eye and would require a detailed evaluation by an ophthalmologist at your earliest convenience for an accurate diagnosis and appropriate management.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: I have like a blind spot on my left eye. It has been like this for a couple of days. It only effects the bottom part of eyesight and is like the after effects of having your photo taken with a bright flash. My eye is also a bit sore to the touch.  I also have Type 2 Diabetes. Do you think I should see an oopthemologist?
title: Eye trouble
